thread.title: Mary Washington
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Mary Washington

author: Mary Washington
title: Mary Washington
text: I only have one request, it would really be nice if the delivery service, could remove old items free of charge. As an appreciation of the customers purchase. Most customers are single parents, with no man power around, and if not free, at least for a small fee.
